text: Blythe Katherine Danner (born February 3, 1943) is an American actress. She is the widow of movie director Bruce Paltrow. She is the mother of actress Gwyneth Paltrow and director Jake Paltrow. She has starred in many Broadway plays and movies. ==Early life== Danner was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. She is the daughter of Katharine (n√©e Kile) and Harry Earl Danner, a bank executive."Dan Gross: Gwynnie had no time for granny" April 28, 2011, Philly.com She has a brother, opera singer/actor Harry Danner, a sister, performer-turned-director Dorothy (Dottie) Danner, and a half-brother, violin maker William Moennig. Danner is of part Pennsylvania Dutch ancestry, and one of her great-grandmothers was born in Barbados (a White Barbadian)."Hollywood celebrity finds family links in Barbados" March 31, 2011, Barbados Advocate ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Actors from Philadelphia Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Saturn Award winners Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:1943 births Category:Living people
title: Blythe Danner
